scripts.db: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && npx sequelize db:migrate && npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.dbtest: npx sequelize db:drop --env test && npx sequelize db:create --env test && npx sequelize db:migrate --env test
scripts.dbprod: npx sequelize db:migrate --env production && npx sequelize db:seed:all --env production
